principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix esports aggression with university prestige.
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel 'strategic' and 'intellectual' yet 'competitive'.
Content is King: Data (Elo, Rankings) is the hero. Visualize it beautifully.
Negative Space: Don't clutter. Let the rankings breathe.
Contrast: High contrast for readability in dark mode.
anti_patterns: No centered text blocks without purpose.
No flat, boring tables. Use glassmorphism for data.

headings.usage: Hero titles, Section headers, Rank numbers

borders.tracing_beam: Use framer-motion to animate a gradient border around active tournament cards.

texture.noise: Overlay a subtle noise texture (opacity 0.03) on the main background to reduce digital flatness.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-bold hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(124,58,237,0.4)] transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-white/20 text-white rounded-full px-8 py-3 hover:bg-white/5 transition-all

tables.header: text-xs uppercase tracking-widest text-neutral-400 border-b border-white/10 pb-4

3d_libraries.usage: Hero section: Floating, interactive 3D chess King/Queen. Use <Float> and <Environment> for realism.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. Install '@react-three/fiber' and '@react-three/drei' for the hero section.
3. Create a 'Layout' component that wraps the app with the dark theme and noise texture.
4. Use the 'Unbounded' font from Google Fonts. Add it to index.html or import in CSS.
5. Implement the 'Bento Grid' for the dashboard and home page.
8. STRICTLY follow the color palette. Do not introduce random colors.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui.
